import React from 'react' import { useContext,useEffect,useState } from 'react' import { CartContext } from '../CartContext' import data from '../Data' const Cart = () => { const {cart} = useContext(CartContext) const id=Object.keys(cart.items) // console.log("id..",id[0]) console.log("hey_all",id) if(cart.items){ let app = data.filter((d)=>{ return d._id=="aaa" }) console.log("app",app) } return ( <>

) } export default Cart
